description: Commands to manage a DNS Zone workload network.

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone create
commands.summary: Create a DNS zone by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network dns-zone create --dns-zone
                                           --private-cloud
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--display-name]
                                           [--dns-server-ips]
                                           [--dns-services]
                                           [--domain]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--revision]
                                           [--source-ip]
examples: az vmware workload-network dns-zone create --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --dns-zone dnsZone1 --display-name dnsZone1 --domain domain1 --dns-server-ips 1.1.1.1 --source-ip 8.8.8.8 --dns-services 1 --revision 1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone delete
commands.summary: Delete a DNS zone by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network dns-zone delete [--dns-zone]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--private-cloud]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]
examples: az vmware workload-network dns-zone delete --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --dns-zone dnsZone1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone list
commands.summary: List of DNS zones in a private cloud workload network.
examples: az vmware workload-network dns-zone list --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone show
commands.summary: Get a DNS zone by id in a private cloud workload network.
examples: az vmware workload-network dns-zone show --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --dns-zone dnsZone1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone update
commands.summary: Update a DNS zone by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network dns-zone update [--add]
                                           [--display-name]
                                           [--dns-server-ips]
                                           [--dns-services]
                                           [--dns-zone]
                                           [--domain]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--private-cloud]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--revision]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--source-ip]
                                           [--subscription]
examples: az vmware workload-network dns-zone update --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --dns-zone dnsZone1 --display-name dnsZone1 --domain domain1 --dns-server-ips 1.1.1.1 --source-ip 8.8.8.8 --dns-services 1 --revision 1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network dns-zone wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
